## Task 3

Make mpg into an object with MPG data from epagas

```{R}
mpg <- epagas$MPG
head(mpg)
```

Find z and then verify that mean of z is equal to 0 and standard deviation is equal to 1

```{R}
z <- (mpg - mean(mpg)) / sd(mpg)
head(z)

```
